group_1.progressNarration: Of the first four stories I have to share,@this one I received from@Livia of Puella Care.
It is the tale of Folklore of Zero.
At that time, none of us could have foretold@just what the future had in store for us.

group_1.textLeft: How is Asahi? Is she still at Suitoku Temple?

group_1.textRight: Yes.
However, even though I could feel her magic@signature, she didn't respond to my telepathy.
Maybe she still hasn't woken up yet@after passing out from her injuries...

group_1.textLeft: I suppose I'll just have to wait for her to@recover before I can ask about the Tokime Clan.

group_1.textRight: But at least she doesn't seem to be in any danger♪
Asahi is especially trusted within@the Tokime Clan, so... *Giggle*♪

group_1.textLeft: Right.

group_1.textRight: What about Urara, how is she doing?

group_1.textLeft: She's in a hospital in Futatsugi City,@but she is awake and recovering.
She revealed her true identity to Yuna Kureha@and she was allowed to leave the group.

group_1.textRight: I thought Yuna would be a bit@more suspicious than that.

group_1.textLeft: Regardless of whether she was suspicious,@she's chosen not to pursue it.
Maybe she didn't blame her, since it@was all her own responsibility.
But now I'm certain that all eight of@the [textYellow:Kimochi] Stones will be assembled.
I don't think there's much room for error.

group_1.textRight: If it works as the Kamihama Magia Union envisioned@it, then by using the energy of the [textYellow:Kimochi] Stones,
The Automatic Purification System@can be spread across the world.
Futatsugi City will also be freed@from the fate of Witchification.
...Hey, Rabi?
Do you think that the reason there was so little@damage is because of Iroha Tamaki's influence?

group_1.textLeft: At the very least, the result seems related@to her strong will that draws in others.
There can be no doubt that she's steadfastly in@opposition to our ideology of resignation...

group_1.textRight: Still, when it comes to the Neo-Magius...@Hime is just waiting...

group_1.textLeft: Right... How is that going...?

group_1.textRight: Unlike the other groups that are dealing with@post-war matters, we're steadily preparing to fight.
We're extending our reach bit by bit,@snatching up Magical Girls.
If left unchecked, I think a major conflict is brewing...

group_1.textLeft: Is it possible that it could be avoided?

group_1.textRight: That's up to what I do...
Taking advantage of the calm situation,@I have no choice but to convince Hime.

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:103300:lipSynch_1][chara:103300:voiceFull_fullvoice/section_102932/vo_full_102905-1-35]Can you do it?

group_1.textRight: I believe I can...
Just as Asahi was able to get some@hope from the Tokime Clan's goals,
maybe Hime could reconsider and stop fighting.
I don't think I can stand by these@feelings of resignation anymore...

group_1.textLeft: ...Right.
But if you're planning on fighting it and find@yourself in danger, get out of there right away.
Death advances the needle towards resignation...

group_1.textRight: I understand.

group_1.textLeft: Well then, I should head home soon.

group_1.textRight: On that note, I feel bad for Nayuta.
Even after she was able to reunite with her Papa,@she had to immediately say goodbye...

group_1.textLeft: I didn't have any other choice...
Touka Satomi's father moved too fast...

group_1.textCenter: Bein' frank, Touka's uncle an' father@both made their move too early.

group_1.textRight: As expected of the Satomi lineage, of course.

group_1.textLeft: How did you get here?

group_1.textRight: When I enhance ya I tend to go pokin' round@yer brain a bit, can't hide much from me.
Don't ya worry, right now I'm@jus' standin' in for Kagome.

group_1.textLeft: What does that mean?

group_1.textRight: She got hurt 'cause of us.
I'm lookin' into all y'alls conditions as@part of makin' good on my misdeeds.
I dunno for sure, but it mighta been@a mistake t' come here first.
Since you two're just sittin' round@blabbin' 'bout the situation.
Nayuta seems to have somethin'@more interesting goin' on at home.
